name: Acceler8tion
description:
SPACE IS A VACUUM, SPACE IS A BEAUTY, SPACE IS ACCELER8TION

A project for 11th grade honors physics semester 1 of Mr.Lyke's class.

  • A local two player tug of war space arcade shooter with realistic concepts of physics
  • Beautiful nebulae and retro graphics
  • Classical music by Aram Khachaturian, Chopin, and of course... Johann Strauss which you can space Waltz to
  • Full gamepad support
  • And you actually learn something, heck it's open source for pete's sake!

Grab a friend, give it a go, and enjoy!

If you are feeling generous, by all means donate! ;D
